mdRecord.dcterms:description: Apologie a Louis Meigret Lionnoes: p. 1-38.

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Binder: Thompson. Bookplate of Hector de Backer. Unidentified bookplate, with motto Après moi le sommeil. From the librery of the comte de Lignerolles, according to Backer catalogue. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 140.
